articles.title: Covid-19 pandemic could lead to HIV surge in West & Central Africa, says UNAIDS chief - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: Around 200,000 people in West & Central Africa became newly infected with HIV last year out of a global total of 1.5 million, the United Nations AIDS agency's (UNAIDS) data shows.
